This is the central class in the information flow amongst classes.

mcmcpars - Variable in class statalign.base.Mcmc

MtMam - Class in statalign.model.subst.plugins
This class implements the mammalian mitochondrial substitution model, see also http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9732458

Constructor used when instantiation is necessary.

This constructor reads rates, equilibrium probabilities and alphabets from the prescibed files
MtREV - Class in statalign.model.subst.plugins

MU_SPAN - Static variable in class statalign.base.Utils
When a new mu of the TKF92 model is proposed in MCMC, it is drawn uniformly from the a neighborhood of the current value.
